 <p>Dr. Kartik V. Bulusu is an Associate Professor of Practice in the Department of Computer Science (CS) and Associate Research Professor in the Department of Mechanical and Aerospace Engineering (MAE). </p>
 
 <p>His research work entails human health and sustainable energy with focus on biofluid mechanics, polymer rheology, low-cost energy technologies and applications of wavelet transforms. 
 <p>He is also working on AI-on-the-edge applications using low-power devices. In his free time, he is loves to tinker with electronics and design low-cost experiments for research and education.</p>
 <p>Dr. Bulusu has been developing low-cost ejector technologies refrigeration in disaster-prone regions and humanitarian needs. </p>
 <p><strong>Office hours:</strong> On-demand <br>(please reach out via email or Slack!)</p>
 <p><strong>Location:</strong> Blackboard Collaborate Course Room</p>
